Reviews.Title: BATTERY DID NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: It was a great bundle, but the battery did not work in my Nikon D5200. I charged battery like it was recommended, but when I put it in the camera, the Nikon D5200 informed me that battery was not compatible with the camera and to insert a Nikon ENEL 14. I kept everything but the battery. I can use the charger on the road and the cleaning cloth.

Reviews.Title: quick charger
Reviews.Author: Rayhn
Reviews.Content: currently in my d5200 camera and working great. Used its travel charger just fine in the wall charged the battery nice and fast.

Reviews.Title: Battery error and possible solution
Reviews.Author: Jon Gardner
Reviews.Content: When I first got this battery and charger, I charged up the battery and put it into my Nikon D5200. I got the dreaded "this battery is not compatible with this device" error.  A couple weeks later, I tried charging it using the official Nikon charger that came with the camera. Lo and behold - it now works perfectly. Go figure. I have no idea if this is a fluke, but if you're running into problems, see if using the official charger helps. (Note: in the interim, I had bought a different replacement battery which worked right out of the box - I don't know if that had any effect on getting this one to start working).

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Mihai Petre
Reviews.Content: I haven't have any problems with it, perfect feet with the camera, very good price. Camera shows the power left too. I love the car charger. I have a Nikon D5200

Reviews.Title: Not D3100 compatible
Reviews.Author: Christy
Reviews.Content: Says it works for Nikon D3100; however, when I put it in my camera it says the battery is not the correct battery. So the battery is useless. The car charger adapter was useful though, so not a total loss I guess.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Nikon Battery and Charger
Reviews.Author: RJB1207
Reviews.Content: I just bought a Nikon DSLR and wanted a backup battery for it and a charger I can use in the car. A charger came with the camera, but it doesn't work in the car. The backup battery and charger arrived quickly, within a day or so of being ordered. The charger that came with the battery charges the battery within an hour--about 50% faster than the charger that came with the camera. It's compact size makes it easy to carry in the gadget bag or in the glove box of the car. Works just like it's suppose to in the car. Couldn't be happier with it.Pranks in Print A Collection of Fake Stories, Phony Ads, and other Media Mischief

Reviews.Title: Great Battery Charger!
Reviews.Author: AuntB
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an extra charger and it is fantastic. You can plug it into your car if you need it which I think is very convenient. Easy to use and a great price. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Hansen G. Josey "Gjosey"
Reviews.Content: charges fast and last a long time, will buy again. works and maintains charge as great as the Nikon. like the 12v cord for the car

Reviews.Title: Works fine when fully charged
Reviews.Author: Texas Buyer
Reviews.Content: The only thing I notice so far is that the battery does not seem to hold charge for more than 3 weeks in the camera.

Reviews.Title: Always good to have a spare
Reviews.Author: Karla U "KMU"
Reviews.Content: For the price of the battery, essentially, one also gets a charger.  The charger that comes with the D5100 kit does not have a car adapter.  Also, the micro fiber cleaning cloth is bigger than the one that came in my cleaning kit.  That was a nice surprise.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Marcus
Reviews.Content: This was everything i expected and more. it charges perfectly and is very compact. thank you! Now i can enjoy using my camera again.

Reviews.Title: Great substitute for the Nikon charger and battery
Reviews.Author: bshea
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this battery and charger kit. This model is not only a fraction of the price of a Nikon battery and charger, but has a higher amperage and lasts significantly longer than the Nikon battery for my D3100. The charger is dual voltage and actually comes with an adaptor for european plugs. The only thing I would change about this package is to add a USB charging cable. The car charger cable is not that useful, but if I could plug in by usb to my computer or my phone's USB adapter to charge the battery, that would be amazing. Still, well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: You don't get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: So my, like many others, Nikon DSLR charger decided to die on me after having it for only like 6 months. I bought this instead close to a year ago, and it has performed countless charges and shows no sign of weakening. I don't use the included battery all too often, but it does work properly with my D5100.

Reviews.Title: Nikon d5100 loves it!
Reviews.Author: Cigarbuff "Cigarbuff"
Reviews.Content: I bought three for my camera. They work very well and I would buy them again . Very good price.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Marsha Heeter
Reviews.Content: Battery didn't work in my grandson's D3100 camera so we will be returning this. op aij p jfop ajpaf [ jfosa

Reviews.Title: Works!
Reviews.Author: G. Garcia
Reviews.Content: Nice charger and battery replacement, I bought two, they both seem to be working fine! I really like them for the price

Reviews.Title: Why this rating
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: So far it is meeting my expectations. I have not had it long enough to give it a five star rating.

Reviews.Title: Worked as you'd hope
Reviews.Author: Yet another name on the internet
Reviews.Content: Battery life is clearly less than the original, but it works, and so does the charger.  Better than you'd expect.

Reviews.Title: So far so good :)
Reviews.Author: Melissa D. Biggers
Reviews.Content: I needed a second battery for my D3100 and this one does the job.  The car charger is especially nice to have.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Charger
Reviews.Author: DamonL
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the charger and battery combo for my Nikon D3100, and it has worked out great.  We needed an extra battery, so that was a plus for the combo deal!!  Charged flawlessly and worked fine with OEM battery that comes with camera.Thanks Big Mike's!!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Steven Johnston
Reviews.Content: This was a great battery and charger for my Nikon D3200.  Fast shipping and it was ready to go out of the box.  My first time as a customer...but not my last.

Reviews.Title: Battery charger
Reviews.Author: Connie Wilkerson
Reviews.Content: It turned out perfectly!...love having more juice to produce great photos, and not having to recharge as much as before!..thanks for having in stock!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Julia Randolph
Reviews.Content: I got my camera for Christmas this last year ,and needed to make sure I always had a spare charged battery. Hasn't failed me:)

Reviews.Title: Battery was incompatible with my D5100
Reviews.Author: Christof Günther
Reviews.Content: Charger worked, but when I inserted the battery into my D5100, I got the message that the battery is incompatible with my camera. Maybe there is a workaround, but I haven't figured it out.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: rob e
Reviews.Content: great value and battery seems to last as long as factory.  purchased to use as a backup so I always have a charged batter on hand.

Reviews.Title: Best deal for the money.
Reviews.Author: Charles Anderson
Reviews.Content: Just as good as original. Love the auto adapter for the charger. Best deal for the money,  would buy another.

Reviews.Author: Pori
Reviews.Content: :) I liked the fact that it had everything....Happy with it.its a complete package! havent tried it yet but we will see

Reviews.Title: Great price, handy to have on hand
Reviews.Author: John H Ousterhout
Reviews.Content: If you've ever had your only battery run down just when you have a great photo opportunity you'd know the value of a spare.I now keep this charger and spare battery in my camera bag so it's available wherever I go. Having a car adapter for the charger doubles its  usefulness.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: pkcorc30
Reviews.Content: Works like original battery and the car charging option is great.  Good value for the money.  No problems with battery compatibility.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: The charger works great in the wall and in the car - which is real convenient if you leave home and forget to charge the battery, on a road trip, or taking a lot of wilderness pics where you only have a 12v car outlet to charge the battery.  The items have worked great, 100% satisfied so far.

Reviews.Title: Charger.
Reviews.Author: wagonmaster615
Reviews.Content: It plugs into the wall and charges just fine. It does what it was designed to do. Good product. Buy it if you need it.

Reviews.Title: replaced my original charger...
Reviews.Author: Jonathan A Belen
Reviews.Content: After four months of using the original charger, it suddenly went kaput on one single drop. Purchased this one last week and so far working. Battery as well. Different type of plugs also helpfull.

Reviews.Title: It's  best to have two
Reviews.Author: ron
Reviews.Content: I keep this charger in my camera bag and I bought one charger to keep in my house, I'm always fully charged and ready to go. Both chargers work great and charge fast.UPDATE: I had the battery for about five months without any problems and then it died on me. My camera kept giving me a message saying that this battery is not good for this camera. So I got in contact with Big Mike's Electronics and they got right back to me and had me get in contact with the manafacture. They had me send my battery back to them and they would send a new one in return.There was a point that I didn't hear back from the manufacture so I got in contact with Big Mike's again and again they inform me that the company was on vacation for a week. A long story short. I got my new battery and it's working fine. Just hope it last longer then five months. In short I just want to say that you can't go wrong with Big Mike's. They will stand by their product and make their customer very happy. If there was six stars then I would give it to them. They went above and be on to help me out.I wish them a good future in the coming years.

Reviews.Title: Very inexpensive and works as well as original equipment
Reviews.Author: John Farrell
Reviews.Content: Delivered very quickly and product exactly as described. Since there products are very competitively priced, I will buy from Big Mike's next time I need a product they handle.

Reviews.Title: battery charger
Reviews.Author: ed
Reviews.Content: Great AAAAAAAAAAAA+++++++++perfect for charging low cost perfect for charging batteries for the camera. shipped quickly;it was a great deal for the money

Reviews.Title: Battery Charger Kit for Nikon
Reviews.Author: Catherine J. Boozer
Reviews.Content: Great charger! Even though my camera screen showed battery was not compatible, Ely told me how to fix it and even offered to send another battery. Thanks!!

Reviews.Title: Its ok, nothing to brag about.
Reviews.Author: Tony C "HONESTY"
Reviews.Content: All I can say about the charger is that its a charger, does what it was made to do.The battery charged but has not been put through the test to really say its a great battery.  I've bought 3 other non-Nikon battery for my other cam and they work great.The extra cloth is pretty cool, always good to have an extra cloth for cleaning lens.The film cover is one of the main reasons I bought this item and its the worst thing ever.  I've had used other screen covers for my cell phone, my Itouch, my IPad and all have came with top and bottom peel away film to protect the main film cover protector.  You peel the first part of the film then place it on the screen then place and remove air then when lined up and all air out you remove the top part of the film and you have a perfect screen protector.  This screen cover that came with this kit is a joke.  Its so cheap that it looks like a piece of plastic just put on for the heck of it.  When placing it with a piece of cardboard it came with, it kind of scratches the film.  When the film is placed it looks so bad I had to remove because the screen did not look clear when on.  Thinking of returning it and get a diff brand.

Reviews.Title: Camera battery and charger
Reviews.Author: Linda Fred
Reviews.Content: Quick shipment and works great!  It certainly met my expectations. Would use this again if I need future purchases or items.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Peggy Burkart
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as an extra battery and charger for my Nikon D5100.  It will be wonderful to be able to charge the battery while driving in the car/RV.  Don't ever want to find myself missing that great photo opportunity because I didn't have a fully charged battery.
